title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.24 - Program for strengthening leadership resources of State educational agencies-activity C
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.24 - Program for strengthening leadership resources of State educational agencies-activity C
State Regulations

Dissemination of information of education. (a) Specific objective. The objective is to improve the department's capability for
communicating information on education to a variety of interested audiences. Hundreds of publications originate annually from organizational units in the
department that are intended to inform educators and the general public about
trends, developments and effective educational programs and practices. (b) Specific
activities. (1)

Improving the quality
of education department publications. (i) To
assure a minimum standard of literary quality for State Education Department
publications. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Edit and rewrite State Education Department
manuscripts as necessary. By June 1978 over 30,000 pages of SED publications will
have been edited
(ii)

To assure practical and effective formats for all department publications. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Layout, specify type, provide illustration, design
and printing instructions for a variety of SED publications. By June 1978 the designs and illustrations as well as
printing instructions will have been provided for approximately 350 SED
publications
(2)

Audiovisual services. (i) Department administrative staff will be
supported in efforts to use communications technology in presentations to the
field, to other agencies and to department staff. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Designing and writing for audiovisual
presentations. Scripts-June 1978
2. Research and assembling pre-produced, audiovisual
materials. Tape and film-June 1978
3. Producing video tapes, film, slides and audio tapes
as appropriate. Finished productions-June 1978
(ii)
A video cassette dissemination service will be initiated for transmittal of
department administrative advisories on programs and practices for which
replication is encouraged among the schools. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Preparation of a treatment and continuity for each
dissemination project. Scripts-June 1978
2. Video tape preparation and editing. Completed video tape production-June 1978
3. Distribution via State video cassette network. Multiple duplication and dissemination-June 1978
(iii)

Department administrative staff and
professionals in the field will be kept updated on instructional technology and
communication techniques. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Identification of new and promising applications of
communications technology. Demonstration seminars-June 1978
2. Preparation of articles and information on new
developments in communications technology. Newsletter-October 1977, April 1978, June 1978
(iv)

Technical support for audiovisual materials display will be supplied to various
department units and to the self-learning center. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Providing manpower and equipment for preparation, setup and maintenance of audiovisual display needs. Successful and dependable audio/visual
presentation-June 1978
(3)

New York State archives records appraisal
and program implementation project (Projections based on eight full-time
equivalent persons)
(i) Complete location and
identification of official State records having historical value. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Review record series inventories. 20,000 record series by January 1, 1978
2. Examine records in agency offices. 200 offices (4/week) by June 30, 1978
(ii)

Rescue historical records in immediate danger of loss or destruction. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date

Approximately 150,000 cubic feet by June 30, 1978
1. Transfer to temporary rescue storage. 2. Microfilm. 3. Sample. (iii)

Transfer accessioned historical records
to archives in Cultural Education Center. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Pack, label and move. 10,000 cubic feet by June 30, 1978
2. Prepare transmittal documents recording legal
transfer. 10,000 cubic feet by June 30, 1978
3. Prepare location registers. 10,000 cubic feet by June 30, 1978
4. Flatten and deacidify needy records. 1,000 cubic feet by June 30, 1978
(iv)

Make records available for use by State agency personnel and general public. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Prepare finding aids. Five agency inventories by June 30, 1978
2. Microfilm. 600 rolls (200 cu. ft.) January 1, 1978-June 30, 1978. 3. Answer reference requests (oral and written). 5200 (200/week)-January 1, 1978-June 30, 1978
4. Study feasibility of automated index and select
modalities. Plan of approach and sample alternatives-June 30, 1978
